lyrics.text:
’A e kau taupo’ou
Fakalaumālie,
Mo e kakai mate
Mou ‘ā ‘o tu’u hake;
Pea ‘utu ‘a e lolo
Ke fonu ai homou ipu.

Ke mou ‘oho hake
‘I he fu’u kalanga,
Kuo fakaongo,
‘I he tu’apō;
Vakai ko e ‘Eiki ta’ane
‘Oku teu hā’ele hifo.

‘Oku hā’ele mai
Ke fakakātoa,
‘A e ngaahi kakai
Ki he fakamaau;
Pea hiki ki he lelei,
‘Akinautolu na’e teu’i.

Ko kolōlia
‘A ia kuo teu,
‘E homou ‘Otua
‘I he’ene ‘ofa;
Ko kimoutolu kuo teu,
Mou ‘alu atu pea ma’u.
